name: Chef John's Indoor BBQ Shrimp
author: Chef John
summary: If the weather puts a damper on your barbeque plans, these indoor barbeque shrimp are so easy and fast. Use the raw, ready-to-peel shrimp that are deveined but still have their shells on (raw, ready-to-peel) to achieve the char-grilled look without worrying about dry shrimp.
ingredients: 1 pound extra large shrimp (16-20 per lb.), shell on, deveined
directions: Season with salt, pepper, brown sugar, chili powder, cumin, allspice, cayenne pepper, lemon juice, ketchup
Pour in olive oil and stir thoroughly
Let shrimp sit for about 15 minutes, no longer
Heat a dry saute pan over medium-high heat until hot but not smoking, or when a few drops of water sizzle and start to bead up before evaporating
Let cook on one side until the shrimp turns from opaque to white about halfway up the side, 3 or 4 minutes
Cook until shrimp are almost cooked through
